mapper.select: select vbi.id, vbi.real_vpc_id, vbi.user_id, vbi.name, vbi.display_name, vbi.description, vbi.status, vbi.host_amount, vbi.ip_amount, vbi.create_time, vbi.modified_time from vpc_base_info vbi where vbi.status != 3
select v.id, v.real_vpc_id, v.name, v.display_name, v.description, v.status, v.user_id, v.host_amount, v.ip_amount, v.create_time from vpc_base_info v where v.id = #{id}

select i.id, i.real_vpc_id, i.name, i.display_name, i.description, i.status, i.user_id, i.host_amount, i.ip_amount, i.create_time from vpc_base_info i left join vpc_bind_host h on i.id = h.vpc_id and flag = 0 where h.host_id = #{hostId} limit 1

#{item}
